title: [Medicine] Researchers discover a single antibody which neutralizes two serious respiratory infections: respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and human metapneumovirus (hMPV). These viruses pose a particularly significant health burden in young children and the elderly.

[Health] Particulate air pollution a growing risk for premature CVD death and disability worldwide. Between 1990 and 2019, the total annual number of premature CVD deaths and years of disability attributable to particulate matter air pollution rose by 31% worldwide.
